## Summary

I've completed the Manual Comparison Page UI Redesign. Here's what was done:

**Changes Made:**

- **StageIndicator.tsx**: Removed `animate-pulse` class from active step for cleaner design (already using cyan colors correctly)

- **comparison/page.tsx**: 
  - Changed step 1 badge from `bg-red-500` to `bg-cyan-500` for consistency
  - Removed `CollapsibleStepCard` import and usage from Stage 2
  - Simplified Stage 2 to use only `ReviewConfirmPanel` component directly

- **CompetitorInputCard.tsx**: 
  - Removed colored left border styling (`borderLeft: 6px solid ${borderColor}`)
  - Changed to simpler card design with gray border (`border border-gray-200`)

- **ReviewConfirmPanel.tsx**:
  - Updated status card background from `from-cyan-50 to-blue-50` to `from-cyan-50 to-teal-50`
  - Changed competitor number badges to use cyan (`bg-cyan-500`) instead of competitor brand colors

- **ComparisonStickyHeader.tsx**: 
  - Restructured header to show only retailer logos centered (removed product images from header)
  - Simplified column rendering to only show retailer logos

- **AppleStyleComparisonTable.tsx**: 
  - Added "Compare" row with product images after the header row
  - Updated section header styling to use `text-gray-500` for better visual consistency

- **ComparisonSpecSection.tsx**: 
  - Updated section header text color from `text-gray-700` to `text-gray-500`

**Files Changed:**
```
app/(main)/comparison/page.tsx   | 81 insertions, 100 deletions
components/comparison/StageIndicator.tsx
components/comparison/CompetitorInputCard.tsx  
components/comparison/ReviewConfirmPanel.tsx
components/comparison/AppleStyleComparisonTable.tsx
components/comparison/ComparisonStickyHeader.tsx
components/comparison/ComparisonSpecSection.tsx
```

- TypeScript type-check: ✅ Passed

- Production build: ✅ Successful
